Aurora.Hilltop, Denver:
Hilltop is a neighborhood of Denver, Colorado. According to the Piton Foundation, in 2007, the population of the neighborhood was 8,623; in 2000, the average household income was $117,835, and there were 3,724 housing units.


== Boundaries ==
The neighborhood is bordered on the west by Colorado Boulevard, on the north 6th Avenue Parkway, on the south Alameda Avenue, on the east Holly Street.
